publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3364 Mr Jamie McGrigor: Royal Navy Scottish Schools 7s—That the Parliament notes the success of the inaugural Royal Navy Scottish Schools 7s which took place at Murrayfield on Wednesday 28 September 2005, with 40 teams from schools across Scotland competing; congratulates Aberdeen’s Robert Gordon’s College on winning an exciting final 28-19 against Selkirk High School; further congratulates the players, coaching staff and spectators from all the schools that took part, the Scottish Rugby Union for staging the competition and the Royal Navy for supporting the event, and hopes that rugby will continue to grow in Scotland and that some of the players in this year’s Schools 7s will be part of a Scotland international squad successful in bringing the 2009 IRB Rugby World Cup Sevens title back to the home of sevens rugby.Supported by: Mary Scanlon*, Alex Johnstone*, Murdo Fraser*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Bill Aitken*, Margaret Mitchell*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Phil Gallie*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Mrs Nanette Milne*

S2M-3364 Mr Jamie McGrigor: Royal Navy Scottish Schools 7s—That the Parliament notes the success of the inaugural Royal Navy Scottish Schools 7s which took place at Murrayfield on Wednesday 28 September 2005, with 40 teams from schools across Scotland competing; congratulates Aberdeen’s Robert Gordon’s College on winning an exciting final 28-19 against Selkirk High School; further congratulates the players, coaching staff and spectators from all the schools that took part, the Scottish Rugby Union for staging the competition and the Royal Navy for supporting the event, and hopes that rugby will continue to grow in Scotland and that some of the players in this year’s Schools 7s will be part of a Scotland international squad successful in bringing the 2009 IRB Rugby World Cup Sevens title back to the home of sevens rugby. Supported by: Mary Scanlon, Alex Johnstone, Murdo Fraser, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Bill Aitken, Margaret Mitchell, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Phil Gallie, Mr Brian Monteith, Mrs Nanette Milne
S2M-3364 Royal Navy Scottish Schools 7s (lodged on 29 September 2005) Mr David Davidson*, John Scott*
S2M-3364 Royal Navy Scottish Schools 7s (lodged on 29 September 2005) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-3364 Royal Navy Scottish Schools 7s (lodged on 29 September 2005) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-3364 Royal Navy Scottish Schools 7s (lodged on 29 September 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3364 Royal Navy Scottish Schools 7s (lodged on 29 September 2005) Elaine Smith*
